txt.en: 'The silver goes to lay our kin to rest. But there is more weregild yet to collect. As Torquil no doubt told you, the Tarkrîp were also allied with the Ongbúrz during their raid.\n\n'I would have you reclaim the gold which they stole from us during their raid, so that it may restitute those who were bereft of family. You may find the Tarkrîp at the cave they call Burzum Pushdug, north of Tór Gailvin.'
'Gold of the Tarkrîp! You have done very well indeed. Now the spirits of my family can rest, satisfied with our vengeance.'
'The weregild you collected will soothe the spirits of the dead. Thank you, Southron!'
'You must collect weregild for the deaths of my kindred!'
'The punishment of the Orcs has appeased my kindred.'
Machar and his brothers Torquil and Eilig are seeking vengeance against Orc-raiders who slew their kin.
Bring the gold-dust back to Machar
The Tarkrîp are just north of Tór Gailvin -- seek out the cave they call Burzum Pushdug.\n\nMachar has asked you to collect gold from the cave of the Orcs who slew his kindred.
